txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Great scales from the worms surrounding Sûri-kylä. Deliver the items to Kaleva at the Lossoth capital.
'We will make use of these. Thank you.'
'We use all that the land offers. The scales of the worms are one such item.'
A Lossoth, Kaleva, at Sûri-kylä is collecting great scales at the Lossoth capital.
Deliver the great scales to Kaleva at Sûri-kylä in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver great scales from the worms surrounding Sûri-kylä in Forochel. The items are to be delivered to Kaleva at the Lossoth capital.
Wanted: Great scales from the worms surrounding Sûri-kylä.
